title: Warm Up Dhaka Campaign
description: Donate your winter clothes to help the vulnerable people of Dhaka stay warm this winter.

title: Chattogram Blanket Drive
description: Join our blanket drive to provide warmth to unserved communities in Chattogram.

title: Sylhet Winter Relief
description: Support the Sylhet region by donating jackets, sweaters, and blankets to those in need.

title: Rajshahi Coat Collection
description: Help us collect coats and sweaters to ensure warmth for the rural areas of Rajshahi.

title: Dhaka Winter Shelter Support
description: Donate bedding and warm clothes to help the elderly in Dhaka during winter nights.

title: Khulna Warm Hearts Initiative
description: Join us in providing winter clothing to the impoverished communities in Khulna.

title: Chattogram Winter Essentials
description: Donate winter essentials such as socks and caps for the unserved communities in Chattogram.

title: Rangpur Warm Clothing Drive
description: Provide warm clothing for families in Rangpur who are battling extreme cold.

title: Sylhet Blanket and Mattress Drive
description: Provide blankets and mattresses to help families in Sylhet combat extreme cold nights.

title: Rajshahi Winter Clothing Appeal
description: Support our initiative to collect and distribute sweaters for rural areas in Rajshahi.

title: Khulna Kids Winter Warmth Drive
description: Donate winter clothes for children in Khulna to ensure they stay warm and healthy.

title: Rangpur Cold Wave Relief
description: Help us tackle the cold wave in Rangpur by donating warm clothing to families.
